text: Inevitably there comes the time when Mr. Hudson suddenly breaks with tradition and arrives there in July, when, just as inevitably, the place is full of American teenagers on an escorted tour. Result: Mr. Hudson and lady love Lollo find themselves playing chaperon (Brenda de Banzie, the official one, has broken a leg) to the girls, who have just been joined by a Jeep-load of boys.
